name: Frank, Rimerman + Co.
description:
Established in 1949, our firm is unique for its pervasive passion and nimble delivery over 60 years of experience. We are consistently ranked as a top ten accounting firm in the San Francisco Bay Area and a top 100 accounting firm in the nation, and were recently noted as the largest accounting firm headquartered in Silicon Valley. With offices in Palo Alto, San Francisco, San Jose and St.
Helena, California, and New York City, and our independent membership in Baker Tilly International, we are a leading source for local and global, accounting and consulting services.
Our team offers an integrated array of specialized services for individuals and businesses.
Known for the exceptional caliber of our people, and as the trusted advisor to high net worth individuals and families, start-up entrepreneurs, and some of the most innovative organizations in Silicon Valley and across the nation, Frank, Rimerman + Co. LLP has been helping its clients realize their goals for three successive generations of insightful expertise and unparalleled quality of service.
Frank, Rimerman Advisors LLC is a subsidiary of Frank, Rimerman + Co. LLP. Frank, Rimerman Consulting is a division of Frank, Rimerman + Co. LLP.
